name: Planetary Defense Command
description:
The Planetary Defense Command is space game that you use your ship and build turrets to defend your planet from enemy's.

We are Relaxed Jam Team, As team we pitch idea and went along with making game out of it. We are all in Reykjavík Academy of Digital Entertainment RADE this was project that we did in 2 weeks and thats all we had. We like to share this game to you.

The people behind the team is Arnar Ingólfsson, Bjarki Már Sigurðsson, Einar Orri Guðjónsson, Einar Sturluson, Róbert Orri Gunnarsson we are Relaxed Jam.

We would like to thank CCP, IGI And RADE for all the help and the support.
